directions: In a glass dish, mix together the olive oil,  mustard, garlic, lemon juice, orange juice, basil and white wine. Add the prawns, and stir to coat. Cover, and let marinate for 1 hour.
Heat an outdoor grill to high heat.
Thread prawns onto skewers. Grill for 3 to 5 minutes, turning once, until pink.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried basil, or to taste
title: Garlic Prawns
